name: Dressers
description: A dresser is a stack of double chests.

name: Closets
description: Here is a design for a cool and interactive closet that is simple to make.

name: Cabinets
description: Here is how to make a simple cabinet.

name: Bunk Bed
description: For the bunk bed, you need a wall that has at least a width of 4 and a height of 4.

name: Bookshelves
description: To make a bookshelf, stack as many bookshelf blocks as you desire.

name: Shelves
description: An Aquarium.

name: Potted plant
description: A plant vase using bamboo and jungle leaves.

name: Desks
description: To make a desk, take your choice of support, (Fence or fence gate look the best) and place 2 of them for a freestanding desk, 1 for a desk attached to the wall.

name: Computers
description: Place an iron block, a painting on the side, and a "keyboard" in front of it.

name: Lamps or light sources
hierarchy: Bedroom furniture > Lamps or light sources
description: Using a redstone lamp is the easiest way to create a toggle-able light source.

name: Curtains
description: Curtains can be useful for the sides of bathtubs, or just as decoration anywhere.

name: Other furniture
description: It's a good idea to add a crafting table to your bedroom, and possibly a jukebox.

name: Tables
description: Tables are an essential furniture item in every living room.

name: Coffee table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Coffee table
description: To create a coffee table, use any type of slab and place them near your sofas, chairs, etc.

name: Corner table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Corner table
description: Build a fence and add a wooden pressure plate, carpet/rug or trapdoor on top for a good looking table.

name: Dining room table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Dining room table

name: Modern table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Modern table
description: Place two glowstone blocks where you want the center of your table to be, then surround the glowstone blocks with glass panes for a cake and coffee table that will light up your living room! You ca...

name: Piston table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Piston table
description: Extended pistons are usually more aesthetically pleasing than fences with pressure plates, as they form a solid top, rather than one with gaps.

name: Simple table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Simple table
description: Place 2 blocks above where you want your table, now create a 2 block deep hole below the blocks above your table (3 if you include the gap for the table which should already be there), get into the...

name: Tablecloths
description: Using carpet blocks, you can replace the pressure plates on tables with carpet, or perhaps top your piston arms with the aforementioned block.

name: Stone age table
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Tables > Stone age table
description: This table is simple, yet looks glorious on medieval structures or mansions.

name: TV
description: There are two main designs for televisions in Minecraft.

name: Sofa and chairs
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Sofa and chairs
description: More Chair Designs.

name: Fireplace
description: Fireplaces give your living room a more "homey" feel.

name: Shelves
description: Building a shelf is simple.

name: Ceiling fan
description: Place any block on the ceiling, then put 4 trapdoors on each side of the block to give it the look of a ceiling fan.

name: Piano
description: Need some music in your house? Here's how to make a piano that plays music or just notes.

name: Concert piano
hierarchy: Living room furniture > Piano > Concert piano
description: or.

name: Cool fences
description: To make a "cool" fence, place a stair where you want your fence to go, then place a slab block on top of each stair.

name: Sink
description: A sink allows you to have a water supply right in your kitchen.

name: Fridge
description: You can make a refrigerator for a nice finish, and to make your kitchen more distinguished.

name: Cupboards
description: All you need is a bookshelf and trapdoor.

name: Stove
description: take two smokers/furnaces and put them side-by-side.

name: Toilet
description: Place a hopper then put a trapdoor on it, then you put a lever by the side.

name: Shower
description: You can place slabs on the ground to mark off the edges of the shower.

name: Bath
description: Use a fence, wall or block and surround a 2×1 area near a wall.

name: Sink and mirror
description: For the sink, you can use a hopper, a cauldron (full or empty), or a minecart (try the rail removal trick from above).

name: Simple (recommended) design
hierarchy: Games room > Chessboard or checkerboard > Simple (recommended) design
description: To make a chess/checkerboard, place a note block anywhere to form the table and board.

name: Design 2
hierarchy: Games room > Chessboard or checkerboard > Design 2
description: Note: Make this in a snowy biome.

name: Alternate (overkill) design
hierarchy: Games room > Chessboard or checkerboard > Alternate (overkill) design
description: If you are a perfectionist and have the time and resources, you could also do this:.

name: Pool table
description: Put down 3×6 dark green wool blocks, with closed trapdoors for sides.

name: Ping pong table
description: Lay down 5×3 wooden slabs.

name: Pac-Man arcade cabinet
description: A simple way is to place two stairs, one on the ground, and one on top of it, upside down.

name: Water spigot
description: Use this if you're making an outside enclosure for your farm animals.

name: Pet door
description: A pet door is actually quite simple to create and will save you the trouble of having to keep the door open for your pets, such as wolves.

name: Radio
description: Basically, all you need are 2 note blocks and an Iron block.

name: Fancy jukebox
description: For this, you will need 4 stair blocks, a jukebox, and a redstone lamp.

name: Redstone
description: Try using Redstone to "deploy" furniture.

name: Maps
description: Maps can be useful, or merely decorative.

name: Floor or table map
hierarchy: Miscellaneous > Maps > Floor or table map

name: Wall clock
description: All you really have to do is place a clock into an item frame and hang it up.

name: Classical clock
description: Take two of any block you want (you must be able to put an item frame on it!), place one of the blocks on the floor, and then place the other one on top of the block.

name: Grill
description: To make a barbecue on the patio or outside of your house, you can craft an anvil and place it where you want on your outdoor space.
